doc:
Fred Kohler Jr. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fred_Kohler_Jr. 0 Fred Kohler Jr. (July 8, 1911 – January 7, 1993) was an American actor who performed in a number of Westerns such as The Pecos Kid and Toll of the Desert. He played nearly 130 film and television roles between 1929 and 1978. Kohler's father was actor Fred Kohler.Kohler and his father appeared twice in the same film. In RKO's Lawless Valley, they played outlaws who were father and son and in one scene, Fred Kohler Jr. says to his father's character "Aw, that's crazy!," and Fred Sr. responds "Careful, son, you're talkin' to your dad, ya know!" Fred_Kohler_Jr. ( July_8_,_1911 – January_7_,_1993 ) was an_American_actor who performed in a_number of Westerns such_as The_Pecos_Kid and Toll of the_Desert . He played nearly_130_film_and_television_roles between 1929_and_1978 . Kohler 's_father was actor_Fred_Kohler.Kohler and his_father appeared twice in the_same_film . In RKO 's_Lawless_Valley , they played outlaws who were father_and_son and in one_scene , Fred_Kohler_Jr. says_to his_father 's_character " Aw , that 's crazy ! , " and Fred_Sr. responds " Careful , son , you 're_talkin ' to your_dad , ya know !
